heading: Frequently asked
text_part_2: or check the most common ones below.

faqs.question: What is the minimum monetary amount to start sponsoring you?
faqs.answer: The bare minimum is one (1) USD per month. So with 12 dollars, you can contribute to this project for a whole year and get listed as a bronze-tier supporter.

faqs.question: Why should our company sponsor your project?
Can I down- or upgrade sponsor tiers? How and when?
Do you have any kind of collaboration deals with educational orgs?
What if the project ends - will I be refunded somehow?
